file_content.text: You--you came back! Please, Gradak has the keys. Kill him and free us. I'm begging you.
Monster! Just kill me if that's what you're waiting for. Do it!
Gradak's in operational control. He should have the keys with him.
Hey! Hey, over here! Please, you've got to help us.
They've got us chained to the equipment, and they cut off our thermal shields if we give them any trouble.
He's not exaggerating. Alien scum are working us to death.
Help us.
I'm not here to rescue prisoners.
I have other priorities.
Keep walking, they're just going to keep making noise until someone comes.
Come on, at least hear them out.
What do I have to do to bust you out of here?
How can I help?
What do I get out of this arrangement?
Why should I?
You callous...! Are you really going to stand idle while we die down here?
No, we're gonna walk away while you die down here. Subtle difference.
Maybe we can help you? Little trade?
Tell me where I can replace my heat gear, and I'll consider helping you.
I need a thermal shield.
I--I don't know that they store any. When one of us dies, they give that shield to the replacement....
I'm here for Gradak Ungan. What can you tell me?
What do you know about Gradak?
He's Advozse like the rest of our sub-human slave-drivers, but extremely well-armed and armored. Fights with a bloody cannon.
He's probably in the operational center, monitoring production.
Look, Gradak's the one who controls the thermal shields and keeps the keys to our shackles.
If you're after him anyway, you might as well help us.
After I take care of Gradak, we'll see what happens.
Might as well.
Okay, you guilted me into it.
You've wasted enough of my time.
I don't need you.
You just better hope you're right.
Make it good.
We need you to lock out the thermal shield controls and get the keys to our shackles so we can make a run for it.
You... you can take my thermal shield if you can free us. You probably need it more than I do.
Don't be an idiot, that's suicide.
It's the only chance we've got.
Take this heat resistor. I won't be needing it.
We'll trade.
Thank you. I'll hold out as long as I can.
What? I don't get one? Hey, wait up!
Hang in there. We won't keep you waiting.
Don't go dying on my account. I'll be fine.
Keep it.
I hope you're right. No one else is going to come save us.
Then you better hope we don't fry before you do.
Look at you acting all selfless. I like it.
Smart move. I might just be able to help you now.
Hand it over.
Please hurry, I--I don't know how long I'll be able to hold out.
Don't worry. It's covered.
Gradak'll have the keys to our shackles. Take them and lock out the thermal shield controls so we can escape.
He monitors production from operational control. Make that monster suffer when you do him.
You aren't with the White Maw. Free us, please.
